moon.mark

Class MExercise

  • java.lang.Object
    • moon.mark.Mark
      • moon.mark.MExercise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MExercise
extends Mark
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class stores the answers of a student (MQuestions) to an exercise.
    Author:
    Juan Riera and Lucia Asencio
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
